data.title: First name begins with “N”
data.meta_description: Details: Current age, faith/religion, birth name, links to movies with reviews
data.text:
N

Nancy Stafford

• Faith: Jesus Christ, raised Southern Baptist

• Birth name: Nancy Elizabeth Stafford

• Husband: Larry Myers

Naomi Watts

• Faith: Buddhism, Transcendental Meditation

• Birth name: Naomi Ellen Watts

• Husband: Billy Crudup

• Ex-Partner: Liev Schreiber (resulting in 2 children)

Naomie Harris

• Faith: Non-Christian, says she believes in God, prays and “likes to believe that we all pray to the same God.”

• Birth name: Naomie Melanie Harris

• Partner: Peter Legler

Natalie Dormer

• Faith: Atheism

• Worldview: Liberalism, Liberal Feminism

• Partner: David Oakes (actor)

• Ex-Partner: Anthony Byrne (director)

Natalie Portman

• Faith: Judaism, but she rejects belief in an afterlife

• Worldview: Progressive Liberalism (activist)

• Birth name: Neta-Lee Hershlag

• Ex-Husband: Benjamin Millepied

• Ex-Partners: Nathan Bogle, Gael García Bernal, Hayden Christensen, and others

Natalie Wood …DIED age 43—Drowning

• Husband: Robert Wagner

• Ex-Husband: Richard Gregson (producer)

• Ex-Partner: Jerry Brown and others

Natasha Richardson …DIED age 45—Epidural hematoma resulting from skiing accident

• Faith: Christianity (Roman Catholicism)

• Birth name: Natasha Jane Richardson

• Mother: Vanessa Redgrave

• Sister: Joely Richardson

• Husband: Liam Neeson

Nathan Fillion

• Faith: Secularism

• Worldview: Liberalism

• Birth name: Nathan Christopher Fillion

• Ex-Fiancées: Vanessa Marcil (actress), Mikaela Hoover and Christina (actress)

Neal McDonough

• Faith: Christianity (Roman Catholicism—devout), refuses to perform sex scenes because of his faith and respect for his wife

• Wife: Ruvé Robertson (aka Ruve Robertson)

Ned Beatty …DIED age 83 (2021)—Natural causes

• Faith: Liberal Christianity

• Worldview: Liberalism

• Wife: Sandra Johnson

• Ex-Wives: Walta Chandler, Belinda Rowley and Dorothy Lindsay

Neil Patrick Harris

• Faith: Agnosticism

• Worldview: Progressive Liberalism, Homosexualism

• Spouse: David Burtka

Nick Frost

• Faith: Atheism, ex-Catholic

• Worldview: Secular Humanism

• Birth name: Nicholas John Frost

• Ex-Wife: Mariangela Frost

Nick Searcy

• Faith: Christianity

• Worldview: Conservatism (outspoken)

• Birth name: Nicholas Alan Searcy

• Wife: Leslie Riley

Nick Nolte

• Birth name: Nicholas King Nolte

• Wife: Clytie Lane

• Ex-Wives: Sheila Page, Sharyn Haddad, ​ Rebecca Linger

• Ex-Partner: Vicki Lewis

Nicholas Hoult

• Partner: Bryana Holly

Nicolas Cage

• Faith: Secularism, raised in Roman Catholicism

• Birth name: Nicolas Kim Coppola

• Wife: Riko Shibata

• Ex-Wives: Patricia Arquette, Lisa Marie Presley, Alice Kim, Erika Koike

Nicole Kidman

• Faith: Liberal Christianity (Roman Catholicism), ex-Scientologist

• Birth name: Nicole Mary Kidman

• Husband: Keith Urban

• Ex-Husband: Tom Cruise

• Ex-Partners: Marcus Graham, Tom Burlinson, Lenny Kravitz, and Q-Tip (aka Jonathan William Davis and Kamaal Ibn John Fareed)

Noah Wyle

• Faith: Undecided, came from non-devout interfaith marriage, and is raising his children with some combination of Jewish and Christian (Episcopalian) beliefs

• Worldview: Progressive Liberalism (activist), Animal Rights activism, Vegetarianism, Climate Alarmism (activist, and falsely claimed that polar bears are “hanging on by a thread” and “may be extinct in our children’s lifetime, due to the effects of climate change”)

• Birth name: Noah Strausser Speer Wyle

• Wife: Tracy Warbin

• Ex-Wife: Sara Wells

Noomi Rapace

• Faith: Secularism • Birth name: Noomi Norén

• Ex-Husband: Ola Rapace (actor)
